How to diagnose SCOT deficiency ?,How is SCOT deficiency diagnosed? Diagnosis of SCOT deficiency is made in people showing the signs and symptoms of the condition and who have absent or reduced SCOT enzyme activity.,GARD,SCOT deficiency
